lead_paragraph: Jeremy Langford had a pretty good tutor to follow last year in Matt Forte. Now he has a big opportunity for the Chicago Bears.

headline.print_headline: RB Jeremy Langford Ready to Assume Bigger Role for Bears
headline.main: RB Jeremy Langford Ready to Assume Bigger Role for Bears
